title: Avengers - The Children's Crusade 01-09 + Ex (2011-2012|Dgtl|E+)
description:
Avengers - The Children's Crusade 01-09 + One-Shot. Promotional info - "The Young Avengers return in an epic saga by series creators Allan Heinberg and Jim Cheung. When Wiccan's reality-altering powers begin to rival those of the Scarlet Witch, the young hero sets out on a quest to find her that spans the Marvel Universe and pits Wiccan against both the Avengers and the Young Avengers. But will Wiccan's desire to solve the mystery of his parentage be his salvation or his undoing? With three words, the Scarlet Witch changed the world forever...and now with her return, nothing will ever be the same for the Marvel Universe. This self-contained Marvel event reintroduces and redefines the Young Avengers and the Scarlet Witch for the Heroic Age, and is essential reading for any Avengers fan."

The issues of the miniseries are by Megan-Empire, while the one-shot is by Zone-Empire. All are digital. Thanks to the scanners for their work, please seed and enjoy! :-)
